Date: Thursday, 5/1/1986
Subject: Progress of Mickey Hart
Dear Sir,
Mickey Hart has an AVG of .304 at A Hana Rainbows!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1986
Subject: Status of Robert Bitter
Dear Sir,
Robert Bitter shouldn't play at AA Maui Whalers!
He has an AVG of .217 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director
